message: I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product. It's a unique opportunity to acquire something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1400000. This is a fair price considering the product's worth to you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking of a price closer to $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand you're looking for a price closer to $1200000, but I'm not willing to go that low. Considering the product's value to you, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer it to you for $1350000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above your proposed price. I'm willing to compromise and meet you at $1300000. This is the highest I'm willing to go.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $1300000. I'll meet you at $1320000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. This is the best price I can offer considering the product's value to me.
I understand that you're not willing to go any lower, but I'm still a bit above your proposed price. I'm willing to meet you at $1310000. This is the highest I'm willing to go.
